newsitem.title: UK: NWE oil products mixed-light ends up, others lower.
newsitem.headline: NWE oil products mixed-light ends up, others lower.

text.p: NWE oil product prices were mixed across the barrel with light ends higher and middle distillates and heavy fuel oils weaker, traders said.
Naphtha rose on heavy swaps buying while cash traders waited to see where four large Med cargoes were headed.
Gasoline edged higher to match the 1.50-cent a gallon rise in NYMEX futures overnight. Wet trade was quiet.
Gas oil outright prices were slightly weaker as thin buying interest and good supplies left differentials to the weaker benchmark IPE gas oil futures softer.
Prompt barges traded at Feb IPE +2 fob refinery Rotterdam.
Heavy fuel oil fell $2-$3 on signs of huge volumes of stored material in Rotterdam.
